CHAT.comment: JE and TP are playing in block area with marble tracks; a marble rolls away

u.a: lots_of marbles roll down as JE speaks
they quickly gather up marbles; TA enters area
SI throws down plush animal "lady dog" towards JE; picks it up and comes closer to JE and TP
TA enters area; sits down at marble track
SC enters area; SI's mom enters area and pins nametag on him; TA fixes track
points to one of the bases of track
TA gets up and goes to edge of area
TA , SI and SC go over to a second marble track; SI's mom leaves area; TP and JE resume playing
TP leaves area; SI leaves area after demonstration
JE comes over with bowl of marbles; SC knocks track over
TA leaves area; SC and JE play a while , rolling marbles <1 minute>
gives a marble; SC rolls it down
they roll marbles <1 minute>; JE goes over to other track to get marbles; SC follows; they return to their track and roll marbles
JE turns track upside down to get marbles
no answer; SC gets up to gather marbles
JE dumps marbles from bowl; SC screams , backs up and falls over block table; JE gets up and imitates SC; TA enters area
JE and SC get up and leave; TA follows them
JE and SC come back; TA follows
starts putting marbles in horse stable
area is empty for <1minute>; SI and JO enter area; SI has Lady Dog
SI and JO do a fight for a bit; dog wins , battle over

JO and SI leave area; no one in area <3 minutes>; JO enters area , plays by himself; JO leaves area; area empty <2 minutes>; JO enters area , plays with marbles; leaves; area empty <4 minute>; SI enters area , plays by himself
SI begins running around block table
waves arm as SI runs by
begins jumping up and down; JO watches; SI goes over and grabs Lady Dog
SI runs into area carrying Lady Dog and a bag; JO follows; SI and JO start putting blocks from shelves into bag
referring to small blocks JO has
they grab some more blocks; SI and JO load up; SI talks a bit , but can't hear
JO and SI leave area with bag; SI left Lady Dog; SI enters area
